languages.text: "Мы можем только мечтать и грезить об этом. Мечтать и грезить..."
"Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."
languages.original_text: "Мы можем только мечтать и грезить об этом. Мечтать и грезить..."

traits.locale_text: "We can only dream about it. Only dream about it..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

traits.locale_text: "We can only dream about it. Only dream about it..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

traits.locale_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

traits.locale_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

traits.locale_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: 「夢のまた夢ですね。私も一目でいいから見てみたい…」
languages.original_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."

traits.locale_text: 「夢のまた夢ですね。私も一目でいいから見てみたい…」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: “这一切只能在梦里了，梦想与向往……”
languages.original_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."

traits.locale_text: “这一切只能在梦里了，梦想与向往……”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: «Ahora solo nos queda soñar. Soñar y suspirar...».
languages.original_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora solo nos queda soñar. Soñar y suspirar...».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: « Nous ne pouvons plus qu'en rêver... »
languages.original_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne pouvons plus qu'en rêver... »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Davon können wir jetzt nur noch träumen. Träumen und uns danach sehnen ..."
languages.original_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."

traits.locale_text: "Davon können wir jetzt nur noch träumen. Träumen und uns danach sehnen ..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Artık elimizden hayalini kurmak ve özlemini çekmekten başka şey gelmez."
languages.original_text: "Now that we can only dream of. Dream of and yearn for..."

traits.locale_text: "Artık bunun sadece hayalini kurabiliyoruz. Hayalini kurup hasretini çekebiliyoruz..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
